amendment.description: To make an additional $200,000,000 available for the Global AIDS Initiative and reduce the amount available for Millennium Challenge Assistance by $200,000,000.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2048 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 41 - 51. Record Vote Number: 432.

action.text: Amendment SA 2048 proposed by Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR 10/31/2003 S13645, S13647-13648; text: CR 10/31/2003 S13645) To make an additional $200,000,000 available for the Global AIDS Initiative and reduce the amount available for Millennium Challenge Assistance by $200,000,000.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2048 proposed by Senator Bingaman.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 2048 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 41 - 51. Record Vote Number: 432.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2048 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 41 - 51. Record Vote Number: 432.
